about_the_game:
Desktop Animi is a cute and stress-relieving desktop pet that not only interacts according to the player's behavior, it also reacts differently due to the flow of real time.

After careful nourishing by players, it will also evolve into other Animi with different characteristics. Let this cute little friend accompany you through every stressful and computer dependent day.
